definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be quiet (late) (NH id., be silent; Aram. [[שְׁתַק]], [[שְׁתֵיק]], 3away be quiet, silent (cf. also [[שׁקט]]));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms., of sea [[יִשְׁתּׂק הַיׇּם]] Jon 1:11; Jon 1:12 (sq. [[מֵעַל]]), of quarrel, strife Pr 26:30; 3 mpl. of persons at sea, [[יִשְׁתָּׂקוּ]] Ps 107:30.
